_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Paper
author: parker@pterodactyl.io
description: High performance Spigot fork that aims to fix gameplay and mechanics inconsistencies.

installation.script:
#!/bin/ash
# Paper Spigot Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
apk add --no-cache --update curl jq

cd /mnt/server
if [ ! -z "${DL_PATH}" ]; then
    MODIFIED_DOWNLOAD=`eval echo $(echo ${DL_PATH} | sed -e 's/{{/${/g' -e 's/}}/}/g')`
    curl -sSL -o ${SERVER_JARFILE} ${MODIFIED_DOWNLOAD}
else
    echo -e "Downloading $MINECRAFT_VERSION jar from papermc"
    case $(cat $MINECRAFT_VERSION | grep -o -e '[1]\.[0-9]*') in
    1.8)
      curl -o ${SERVER_JARFILE} https://papermc.io/ci/job/Paper/443/artifact/Paperclip.jar
      ;;
    1.9)
      curl -o ${SERVER_JARFILE} https://papermc.io/ci/job/Paper/773/artifact/paperclip.jar
      ;;
    1.10)
      Mcurl -o ${SERVER_JARFILE} https://papermc.io/ci/job/Paper/916/artifact/paperclip.jar
      ;;
    1.11)
     curl -o ${SERVER_JARFILE} https://papermc.io/ci/job/Paper/1104/artifact/paperclip.jar
      ;;
    1.12)
      curl -o ${SERVER_JARFILE} https://papermc.io/ci/job/Paper/lastSuccessfulBuild/artifact/paperclip.jar
      ;;
    latest)
      curl -o ${SERVER_JARFILE} https://papermc.io/ci/job/Paper-$(echo $(curl https://launchermeta.mojang.com/mc/game/version_manifest.json | jq -r '.latest.release' |  grep -o -e '[1].[0-9]*' | head -1))/lastSuccessfulBuild/artifact/paperclip.jar
      ;;
    *)
      curl -o ${SERVER_JARFILE} https://papermc.io/ci/job/Paper-$(echo $(curl https://launchermeta.mojang.com/mc/game/version_manifest.json | jq -r '.latest.release' |  grep -o -e '[1].[0-9]*' | head -1))/lastSuccessfulBuild/artifact/paperclip.jar
      ;;
    esac
fi

variables.name: Minecraft Version
variables.description:
The version of minecraft to download. 

Use major versions like 1.13 or 1.10. If you put in a minor version it will be cut down to the major version.

variables.name: Server Jar File
variables.description: The name of the server jarfile to run the server with.

variables.name: Download Path
variables.description: A URL to use to download a server.jar rather than the ones in the install script. This is not user viewable.
